i1.name: Assassin's Mark
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Akali's''' damaging [[champion ability|abilities]] against enemy {{tip|champions}} creates a ring around them for 4 seconds and grants her {{as|{{pp|key=%|30 to 60 for 4|1 to 16}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds while moving away from them. Subsequent ability damage while a ring is active will only refresh its duration.
If '''Akali''' leaves the ring within its duration, she regains the {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains ''Swinging Kama'' for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|Swinging Kama:}} '''Akali's''' next basic attack's {{sti|range}} is doubled, deals {{pp|29+3*(x-1) for 8;then +9*x for 5; then + 15*x|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and restores {{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|10 to 20 for 3|1;8;13}} energy}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Akali's damaging champion ability against enemy champions creates a ring around them for 4 seconds and grants her 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed for 2 seconds while moving away from them. Subsequent ability damage while a ring is active will only refresh its duration.
If Akali leaves the ring within its duration, she regains the bonus movement speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains Swinging Kama for 4 seconds.
Swinging Kama: Akali's next basic attack's range is doubled, deals 29+3*(x-1) for 8;then +9*x for 5; then + 15*xundefined − (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage and restores 1;8;13 ‒ undefined energy.
i1.notes:
* ''Swinging Kama'' gives a static '''bonus''' range which doesn't change if '''Akali's''' range changes during it (i.e {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}):
** If ''Rapid Firecannon'' fully charges within ''Swinging Kama''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s duration, '''Akali's''' total range increases to {{tt|337.5|125{{times}}2{{times}}1.35}}.
** If ''Rapid Firecannon'' fully charges before gaining ''Swinging Kama'', '''Akali's''' total range is increased to {{tt|395|125{{times}}1.35{{times}}2 + 125{{times}}1.35 (which is the bonus range Swinging Kama gives){{times}}0.35 (further increased by Rapid Firecannon)}}.
* The ring will create around the last target hit of ''{{ai|Five Point Strike|Akali}}''.
* The empowered attack can be {{tip|dodge|dodged}} and {{tip|block|blocked}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with {{tip|blind}}.

q1.name: Five Point Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' unleashes a flurry of kunais in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. Enemies hit at maximum range are also {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

At rank 5, ''Five Point Strike'' deals{{ft|{{as|25% '''bonus''' magic damage}}|{{as|{{ap|130*1.25}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|65*1.25}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60*1.25}}% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}}}}to {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali unleashes a flurry of kunais in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit at maximum range are also slowed by 50% for 0.5 seconds.
At rank 5, Five Point Strike dealsto minions and monsters.
q1.notes: * Cast location is determined at the end of cast time.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 65% AD) (+ 60% AP)

w1.name: Twilight Shroud
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' restores {{sti|{{as|80 energy}}}}, gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 2 seconds, and detonates a smoke bomb a fixed distance away in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain.
Entering the shroud renders '''Akali''' {{tip|invisibility|invisible}}, unless she is {{tip|dash|dashing}}.

'''Akali's''' basic attacks and abilities will break the invisibility and prevent her from entering it for {{pp|type=minutes|changedisplay=true|round=3|1;0.9;0.825;0.725;0.625|1;8;11;20;30}} seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and casts.
The {{ai|Shuriken Flip|Akali|marked}} section of ''Twilight Shroud's'' will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali restores 80 energy, gains bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds, and detonates a smoke bomb a fixed distance away in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain.
Entering the shroud renders Akali invisible, unless she is dashing.
Akali's basic attacks and abilities will break the invisibility and prevent her from entering it for 1;8;11;20;30 ‒ undefined seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and casts.
The marked section of Twilight Shroud's will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.
w1.notes:
* '''Akali''' will also not gain the {{tip|invisibility}} if she is {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.
* It is possible for '''Akali''' to detonate the smoke bomb on the far side of terrain from her current location.
* The effects are applied before the cast time, and '''Akali''' can move during the cast time.

effects.str:
• Bonus Movement Speed: %

  • Shroud Duration:

e1.name: Shuriken Flip
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|flips}} in the opposite direction and fires a shuriken in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}.
The shuriken ''marks'' the enemy or the last {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali|smoke}} section hit for 3 seconds. While the target or smoke section is marked, '''Akali''' can reactivate ''Shuriken Flip''.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} towards the marked target or smoke section, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies it deals the same {{as|magic damage}} upon arrival.
'''Akali''' will not flip backwards while she is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali flips in the opposite direction and fires a shuriken in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing them magic damage.
The shuriken marks the enemy or the last smoke section hit for 3 seconds. While the target or smoke section is marked, Akali can reactivate Shuriken Flip.
Recast: Akali dashes towards the marked target or smoke section, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies it deals the same magic damage upon arrival.
Akali will not flip backwards while she is immobilized.
e1.notes:
* Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Shuriken Flip'' does not interrupt '''Akali's''' previous move or attack orders.
** The {{sbc|Recast}} does.
* '''Akali''' will dash backwards up-to 400 units in a straight line. This dash can cross terrain if the end point is beyond it. If she would end the dash inside terrain, she will instead look for a location  in either direction left or right that is outside of terrain and dash there. If there is no such location, she will dash only up to the wall at her normal speed, ending the dash early.
* The shuriken missile will fire from wherever '''Akali''' is at the end of the cast time (usually mid-dash), but always towards and reaching the location that was 825 units in front of her at the start of cast. The only exception is if she moves via {{si|Flash}}, in which case the range of the missile is decreased relative to the distance she blinked.
* Killing an enemy with the shuriken will still mark the last area of the {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali|shroud}} hit.
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast={{ai|Five Point Strike|Akali}} and {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali}} are usable. {{ai|Shuriken Flip|Akali}} is disabled for 10 seconds and then interrupts. Both dashes of {{ai|Perfect Execution|Akali}} interrupt.|items=true,,,interrupts|spells=true,interrupts,true,true,false}}

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 35% AD) (+ 50% AP)
• Total Damage: (+ 70% AD) (+ 100% AP)

r1.name: Perfect Execution
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} {{pp|675;675 to 825 by 25|type=distance from target|0;525 to 675}} units towards the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in her path.
''Perfect Execution'' can be recast after a {{fd|2.5}} second {{tt|static cooldown|unaffected by cooldown reduction}} within 10 seconds of the first activation.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in her path, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 200 for 11|0 to 70|formula=2.86% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health, capped at 70% '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Akali dashes 0;525 to 675 ‒ undefined units towards the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in her path.
Perfect Execution can be recast after a 2.5 second static cooldown within 10 seconds of the first activation.
Recast: Akali dashes in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in her path, increased by 0 to 70 ‒ undefined.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|75 to 215}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|75*3 to 215*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during either dashes will interrupt them, but '''Akali''' will deal damage to any enemies she comes in contact with at the new location.
** Enemies already hit by either of ''Perfect Execution's'' casts cannot be affected more than once by the same cast.

effects.str:
• Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Maximum Magic Damage: (+ 90% AP)
